com.simsilica.lemur.core

Class AbstractNodeControl<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.scene.control.AbstractControl
      • com.simsilica.lemur.core.AbstractNodeControl<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.export.Savable, com.jme3.scene.control.Control, com.jme3.util.clone.JmeCloneable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuiControl

    public abstract class AbstractNodeControl<T>
extends com.jme3.scene.control.AbstractControl
    A default abstract implementation of a Control that will only allow attachment to a Node and provides a special getNode() method to subclasses.
